content: of the remaining 14sts around this leg and then single_crochet in each of the remaining 11sts around the first leg 30sts ^^please feel free to work more or less single_crochet at the start of round 15 to reach the side of the leg and to single_crochet into whichever st feels the most comfortable on the fastened off leg as you may be in a different position to me on the leg because of your own personal gauge/gauge see frequently asked questions to learn more about personal gauge/gauge yarn and hook choice there will be a small hole between the legs when joined when you have finished the doll simply take a small piece of yarn and with your darning needle sew the hole closed the toes are designed to turn outwards a little because as a rule people don t stand with their feet pointing straight ahead ☺ round 16 single_crochet in each st around 30sts body continue to crochet in continuous spirals without joining the rounds using a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts round 17 *single_crochet in each of the next 4sts 2sc in next st repeat from * around 36sts round 18 *single_crochet in each of the next 5sts 2sc in next st repeat from * around 42sts round 19 *single_crochet in each of the next 13sts 2sc in next st repeat from * around 45sts stuff the body firmly as you go make sure to stuff the top of the legs at the same time too round 20 *single_crochet in each of the next 3sts decrease repeat from * around 36sts round 21 *decrease single_crochet in each of the next 4sts repeat from * around 30sts round 22 *single_crochet in each of the next 3sts decrease repeat from * around 24sts round 23 single_crochet in each st around 24sts round 24 *decrease single_crochet in each of the next 2sts repeat from * around 18sts round 25 single_crochet in each st around 18sts round 26 in this next round we will be working a single_crochet into each st around and also attaching the arms at the same time remember to make sure the thumbs are at the front to begin with you need to single_crochet in each st until you reach the side of the body - i was at the back of the doll as pictured and i worked an single_crochet in each of the first 6sts but it may differ for you dependent upon your personal gauge yarn choice and hook size then work the next 3 single_crochet sts through the two loops in each st at the top of the arm as well as the two loops on the body please see photo then continue to single_crochet in each st to the other side of the body i worked an single_crochet in 6sts across the front of the body and attach the other arm in exactly the same way single_crochet in each remaining st around as appropriate
